short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's you search the title of the current Netflix, Disney Plus or Amazon Prime movie or series on letterboxd.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it possible for you to search the title of the movie or series that you are watching on letterboxd.com with only one click.

Simply click the extensions icon and you are forwarded to letterboxd.com's search page in a new tab.

You can use this extension when the video is currently playing or when you are at its title page.

Supported streaming services are:
- Netflix
- Disney Plus
- Amazon Prime Video
